choices.name: Get started with Welsh research.

hidden.content:
• Search criteria

  • National Library of Wales

  • Work and worship
  • Other online resources

• * Good: Using the articles and videos in this Choice, write down key learnings for research resources. Then use the learnings for searches for an ancestor.
  • * Proficient: Same as above, for two or more ancestors.

content.text:
1. Overview: Learn about Wales research resources in this FamilySearch Wiki article.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: Wales Genealogy

  2. Learn more about resources in this blog article.

    ☆ FS—Discover Your Welsh Ancestry in These 3 Key Sources

  3. Get an overview of Welsh family history on the Archives.com site.

    ☆ AR—Welsh Family History

  4. Tips: Explore these Welsh research tips from Findmypast.

    ☆ FMP—Welsh Family History Tips—33:08
    ☆ FMP—How to Find Welsh Ancestors—65:10

  5. Learn more about Welsh research in these articles from Price Genealogy.

    ☆ PR—Wales Research – Part 3
    ☆ PR—Wales Research – Part 4

  6. Learn how to find online resources for research.

    ☆ RT—Online Resources for Welsh Genealogy—19:31 - 2022  
    • Search criteria
    • Major websites
    • National Library of Wales
    • Archives
    • Societies
    • A sense of place
    • Work and worship
    • Other online resources




  7. Explore a variety of resources on the WalesFreeAncestry site.

Records
  1. Learn about problems and opportunities with Welsh records.

    ☆ PR—Wales – Problems and Resources

  2. Follow this case study in basic Welsh records research.

    ☆ PR—How to Search Wales Genealogy Records

  3. Record Finder: Use the Wales Record Finder to understand record types for research.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: Wales Record Finder

  4. Forebears.io: Explore the ☆Forebears.io site for research records.

choices.name: Learn more about Welsh names and terms.

content.text:
1. Explore Welsh names and patronymics (naming customs passed down from fathers to children).

    ☆ Pronunciation and Patronymics

  2. Naming Patterns: Learn more about Welsh naming patterns.

    ☆ FS: Welsh Naming Patterns

  3. Search the ☆Geneanet site for Welsh surnames.
  4. Search for Welsh surnames in a number of databases.
  5. Place Names: Explore the Glossary for Welsh Place Names on the Welsh Family History Archive site.
  6. Listen to authentic pronunciations of Welsh place names.

choices.name: Explore Wales maps.

content.text:
1. Explore Welsh maps on the GenMap UK site.
  2. Explore Welsh map resources on the Welsh Family History Archive site.
  3. Explore the ☆David Rumsey collection of Welsh maps.
  4. Explore the ☆Old Maps Online site for Wales maps.
  5. Explore the ☆Atlas of Wales on the Wikipedia site.
  6. Explore the ☆Old Maps of Wales on the Wikipedia site.
  7. Explore a ☆directory of United Kingdom cities, towns, and regions in the Falling Rain site.

choices.name: Explore Wales newspapers.

content.text:
1. Explore the National Library of Wales for newspaper resources.
  2. Explore the Welsh Journals site for journals published from 1735 to 2007.
  3. Search Wales newspapers in the ☆onlinenewspapers.com site.

choices.name: There are a number of websites with valuable resources for Welsh research.

content.text:
1. Explore links in the FamilySearch Wiki.
  2. Explore links in ☆Cyndi's List.
  3. Explore links in ☆Genealogylinks.net.
  4. Explore links in the WalesGenWeb site.

choices.name: Use QUIKLinks, Partners, and GenealogyInTime to quickly search the most common record collections for Wales.

content.text:
1. QUIKLinks are indicated by lightning-bolt icons in the Goals above.They point to collections with 50,000 or more records. When you click a QUIKLink icon, scroll down on the resulting page to see the QUIKLinks.
  2. In the Partners section (near the top of the page), explore additional record collections in FamilySearch, Ancestry, Findmypast and MyHeritage.
  3. Explore the Scotland and Wales page of the GenealogyInTime website. Record collections are listed and described in order from newest to oldest additions, including FamilySearch, Ancestry, and many other sources.

name: Get Help
section_name: Get help with your Welsh research.

choices.name: Use Facebook pages to get answers to your questions.

content.text:
1. Visit the Wales Genealogy page on Facebook.
  2. Visit the Welsh Genealogy group on Facebook.
  3. Visit the British Isles Genealogy Research Community on Facebook.
  4. See the Genealogy on Facebook list of Facebook groups dedicated to helping with research for Wales.

choices.name: Join a mailing list, community, or message board for Wales research.

content.text:
1. Explore the ☆FamilySearch community for Wales research.
  2. Explore the British Genealogy site for UK research help.
  3. Get free help with your Wales research questions from members of the RootsChat forum.
  4. Explore the Welsh research mailing lists available on Cyndi's List.
  5. Explore the ☆FamilySearch community for help with Wales research.
  6. Use the ☆Ancestry message boards to read or post questions about Wales research.
  7. Explore Wales research questions in the ☆Genealogy Stack Exchange.

choices.name: Learn about Wales genealogy societies.

content.text:
1. Learn about Wales genealogy societies in this FamilySearch Wiki article.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: Wales Societies

  2. Explore the Welsh American Genealogical Society site.

  3. Explore Wales genealogy society sites on Cyndi's List.
  4. Get help at a family history center in Wales.
